job-offers.title: Named Account Support Engineer (NASE)
job-offers.description:
Are you ready to work with technologies that are changing the future?
Are you excited to grab the opportunity to do more in your job and to gain amazing skills and knowledge in enterprise software support?
Are you looking for the right place where you will work with the most exciting technologies and grow in your career while providing excellent support?
If this aligns with your career plan, sounds like “your kind of company”, and you feel passionate about supporting software products join us and expand your talent.

Join us at Tek Experts. We are a leading global provider of technical support and consulting services on behalf of the world’s largest IT companies.

With 5,000 employees across six global offices, we have built a reputation for deep technical expertise and providing exceptional customer experiences. We operate a 24/7/365 service across borders, languages, and time zones.

What you`ll be doing:
Be the customer’s primary point of contact for product-related issues and build and maintain a relationship with the customer
The assigned engineer will learn the customer’s specific environment
The assigned engineer will own the problem until resolution
Enable seamless collaboration with proper case documentation and ensure timely elevations to drive fast resolution
Ability to address support incidents more efficiently and effectively
Providing excellent troubleshooting skills while managing the customer during an extremely Critical time and providing deep technical expertise on a given product family
Create knowledge from cases where it makes sense and is helpful for teams and customers
Qualifications
Minimum 2 years of experience in IT business environment
Good understanding of networking concept and data traffic; networks protocols; routers and switches
Knowledge in how web applications work (HTTP, HTML, CSS);
Experience with Windows Server (2008, 2012 & 2016)
Customer orientated, motivated to take charge of both customer engagement and problem
Excellent customer service skills
Excellent written and oral knowledge of English. A second European language will be considered as an advantage.
Logical thinking and having a common sense in a daily business routine
Strong Team Player who is also self-driven and needs no close supervision from his manager
Ability to work in a dynamic environment, often with tight deadlines and
Analytical skills combined with excellent customer focus and soft skills
Problem-solving skills
Strong troubleshooting skills
Strong leadership skills and decision making
Prioritization skills
Attention to details
A highly motivated person with a positive attitude, being an influencer and a self-learner who wants to constantly develop new and current skills, and embraces changes
What we offer you
To say people are our greatest asset has become something of a cliché but at Tek Experts, we strongly believe it’s true.

2 Pozitano Square, Floor 2 - Perform Business Center, 1000 Sofia
